December, 1050: Evan understands the difference between friendly and hostile animals January, 1051: Evan: Hi Bella Bella: Hi Evan! Mum sent me to tell you to do some chores around the farm instead of just relaxing all the time. If you want though, we could sneak off and go play instead! Evan: I'll think on it - you always were a bad influence on me Bella: Hey - that's what sisters are for!
January, 1051: Evan does nothing all month
